MZ Wash soap removes dirt without leaving residues and prepares the surface for polishing; its intense formation of foam and pleasant, tropical scent make MZ Wash convenient and enjoyable to use. This car shampoo dries quickly and leaves behind a beautiful deep gloss. MZ Wash is also suitable for regular care and value preservation of the vehicle. MZ Wash is also officially approved for oil separators by DEKRA.

Simple, effective, elegant. Menzerna’s premium gelcoat polishing system minimizes working time while producing brilliant gloss.

From start to finish, Menzerna’s exceptional gelcoat polishing and protection products make restoring and maintaining your boats and trailers a simple task with rewarding results. Premium One-Step Polish eliminates significant defects and breaks down to a fine finish in one step. Premium Gloss refines your surface – particularly black – into a flawless mirror. entry.title: Menzerna P175 Ultra Fine Dry Polishing Compound
entry.summary:
Vendor: Menzerna
Type: Metal Polish
Price: 55.50 - 104.99 (2 variants)

Ultra-fine high gloss colouring compound for all metals and wood coatings.  Use after P204 with our domet flannel buff for a flawless finish on all wood coatings.  Achieve a mirror finish on all metals.

  • White in colour
  • Approx 3 pounds per bar
  • Cut=2
  • Gloss=9

Buffing with Solid Bar Compound

To achieve a high gloss finish it is first necessary to sand the surface so it is perfectly flat with all of the imperfections and orange peel removed.  Depending on the type of coating, start with a medium grit sandpaper, then continue with progressively finer grits ultimately finishing with 600-1000 grit before beginning the buffing process.  Keep in mind that the purpose of buffing is to remove sanding scratches and not to level the surface.

We offer a wide variety of solid bar buffing compounds that range from coarse to extremely fine, and with different properties from dry to greasy for the appropriate level of lubrication and heat reduction.  In addition, our compounds are designed specifically for the material being buffed which will result in better finish quality and greater efficiency.  Compounds for buffing metal will never perform as well on wood coatings as our compounds formulated for lacquer, polyurethane and polyester coating.

Our general recommendation for buffing guitar finishes is to sand the topcoat to a minimum of 1000 grit.  Using a 60/60 cotton buff apply Menzerna P204 compound to the wheel and proceed to remove the sanding marks.  After the first pass in one direction, buff 90 degrees against the buff lines to smooth out the surface completely eliminating the sanding marks.  Then with a bleached Domet flannel buff apply Menzerna W16 compound to the wheel and bring the surface to an excellent high gloss finish.  For an even higher level of extreme gloss substitute the W16 for our P175 Super Finish compound.  After completing the buffing process clean the surface with Jescar Guitar Polish spray and a microfiber polishing cloth.

entry.title: Menzerna Top Inspection Spray
entry.summary:
Vendor: Menzerna
Type: Paint Correction
Price: 24.99

One of the challenges of ensuring complete defect removal is the ability to inspect the surface for any areas requiring additional polishing. Since the polishing process itself can mask these remaining areas with compound residue, it is necessary to completely clean the surface. Menzerna's Top Inspection Spray was developed specifically for this purpose. 

  • contains no silicone
  • completely safe for use in paint areas, body shops, and finessing areas
  • perfect for new car showrooms to eliminate fingerprints, dirt, dust and grime and will leave a perfect finish
  • available in a convenient 500ml spray bottle.

Combining the cutting and finishing ability of PF 2500 with a high quality carnauba wax, 3 in 1 is perfect for one-step details.  With its silicone-free carnauba wax, 3 in 1 is safe to use in the paint area of a body shop to polish and protect the non-repaired areas.  It is also excellent for fleet and dealership used vehicles for added value  and increased sales.

Show car finish for the ultimate deep gloss! Menzerna Super Finish Plus 3800 is a high-gloss polish, especially for a show car finish. SFP 3800 removes polishing marks, micro-scratches and holograms for the maximum deep gloss and reflectiveness.

entry.title: Menzerna Super Finish Polish 3500
entry.summary:
Vendor: Menzerna
Type: Paint Correction
Price: 28.49 - 223.99 (3 variants)

Swirl remover for a perfect mirror finish! Menzerna Super Finish 3500 is a versatile high-gloss polish for all automotive clear coats. SF 3500 removes polishing marks, micro-scratches and holograms for a brilliant deep gloss.

Menzerna Super Finish SF-3500 is the next generation of Nano Polish PO 106 FF. Super Finish SF-3500 contains a micro-fine abrasive dust that quickly removes light imperfections and holograms while creating a mirror shine. This new formula features less dusting than the original Nano Polish and leaves your vehicle with the glossiest possible finish.

SuperFinish is our advanced solution for OEM assembly plant applications, body shops and detailing/reconditioning specialists.  It can be used with either a rotary or random orbital polishing machine.

If you are looking for a perfect, hologram and swirl-free finish on the darkest paint colours without any hiding or filling of defects, SuperFinish is your first choice for permanent defect repair.

Benefits:

  • Finest abrasives for removing fogging and holograms
  • Brilliant deep gloss
  • Silicone-free

entry.title: Menzerna SI 2400 Super Intensive Polish
entry.summary:
Vendor: Menzerna
Type: Paint Correction
Price: 223.99

The best solution for liquid application to older and dry coating systems. Improved agility ensures easy handling and brilliant results. 

Benefits:

  • Liquid formulation is ideal for working on older and dry surfaces
  • Silicone-free

Super Intensive Polish has become the industry standard for both the automotive OEM assembly plants as well as the professional reconditioning detailers.  The introduction of a new generation of scratch-resistant clear coat proved to be a difficult challenge for the conventional polishes.  A new polishing technology was required to eliminate the sanding scratches that are a result of the coating repair process.  These 2000 grit sanding marks had to be quickly repaired on the assembly line to ensure that the line would not be held up.  Despite the difficulty of the challenge, the engineers at Menzerna successfully developed the first generation of polishes for scratch-resistant clears.

Menzerna’s line of scratch-resistant polishes exceeded all expectations of polishing performance on fresh OEM applied paint, offering increased speed and levels of gloss that were not thought possible with conventional polishes.  The benefits of this technology carried over to aftermarket applications, becoming the most popular paint correction system for the professional reconditioning specialist.

Super Intensive Polish will correct light scratches and eliminate 2000 grit sanding marks on fresh paint.  If necessary on dark colors, it can be followed up with PO106 SuperFinish or PO85RD for an absolutely flawless finish.

entry.title: Menzerna Super Heavy Cut Compound 300
entry.summary:
Vendor: Menzerna
Type: Paint Correction
Price: 32.99 - 248.99 (3 variants)

High performance finish thanks to the latest polishing technologies with divisible polishing grit! Menzerna Super Heavy Cut Compound 300 is the ultimate sanding polish for automotive clear coats with maximum sanding effect featuring the latest technology. SHCC 300 removes 1200 grit sanding marks and signs of use in the shortest time without damaging the surface.

Using the same technology found in the Fast Gloss 400, the new SHCC300 uses additional polishing powder with heavier cutting ability to remove deeper defects quickly, without introducing scratches and swirls.  Only one step of polish is required after using SHCC 300 to bring out an excellent high gloss finish, eliminating the needs for an intermediate polishing step, saving time and effort.  SHCC 300 will remove a 1200 grit sanding mark on fresh paint and can be followed by FF 3000 or SF 4000 for a perfect finish.

Benefits:

  • Extremely high abrasion
  • Extremely fast removal of sanding marks
  • High yield
  • Premium polishing compounds 
  • No dust formation
  • Easy to handle
  • Silicone-Free

entry.title: Menzerna Finish Compound P126
entry.summary:
Vendor: Menzerna
Type: Metal Polish
Price: 27.99

Produces a high gloss and fine mirror finish on stainless steel. Menzerna P126 is a finishing compound developed especially for stainless steel; it’s also suitable for precious metals. Cut / Gloss: 3 / 8

P126 is recommended by Menzerna as the final stage in a two-step polishing process for stainless steel; start with Menzerna 439T and finish with P126. Additional polishing steps can add more clarity.

 

Precautions: Do not breathe dust during use. Wear appropriate safety clothing and respiratory protection. Generated dust exposure can irritate eyes and skin.

entry.title: Menzerna Super Finish Compound P175
entry.summary:
Vendor: Menzerna
Type: Metal Polish
Price: 49.99

Produces a surface free of lines and buff-trails with a premium, deep mirror gloss. P175 is a superfine, high-gloss compound that is versatile in application. Capable of producing a buff-trail free finish on stainless steel and suitable for use on many metal and other surfaces. Spectrum recommends pairing this compound with soft buffs like our Matchless untreated white, untreated checker plate and flannel airways.

Cut / Gloss: 2 / 9

P175 Super Finish is recommended by Menzerna as the final stage in a two- to three-step polishing process and it’s suitable for stainless steel, aluminum, brass and other non-ferrous metals, coated surfaces, and plastic surfaces. Additional polishing steps can add additional clarity.

entry.title: Menzerna Medium Cut Compound P14F
entry.summary:
Vendor: Menzerna

Menzerna Medium Cut Polish 2000 (MCP 2000) is the classic Medium Cut Polish. Ideal for the removal of scratches, sanding marks on fresh coatings and signs of use or washing.  A solid basis for a fast victory.

entry.title: Menzerna Finish Compound GW16
entry.summary:
Vendor: Menzerna
Type: Metal Polish
Price: 34.99

The flagship of the Menzerna solid paste program: a single-stage product that is unrivalled in terms of abrasiveness and gloss, GW16 is best suited to polishing coated woods and plastics. We suggests pairing this compound with soft buffs like our Matchless untreated white and flannel airways.

Cut / Gloss: 5 / 7

SKU: M-GW16-F

Capable of removing 800 grit sanding marks from polyurethane coatings, GW16 is recommended by Menzerna as a single-stage, high gloss polish or the first stage in a two-step polishing process. Bring your coated/lacquered wood to an exceptionally glossy mirror finish by following up with Menzerna P175. GW16 can also be used to refine your finish after cutting with Menzerna GW18 Heavy Cut and/or Menzerna P204 Medium Cut compounds.

Particularly effective on polyurethane coatings but also suited to polyester coatings, lacquers, and other coatings, as well as plastics.

Menzerna suggested process for: painted/coated surfaces.

Precautions: Do not breathe dust during use. Wear appropriate safety clothing and respiratory protection. Generated dust exposure can irritate eyes and skin.

entry.title: Menzerna Heavy Cut 439T
entry.summary:
Vendor: Menzerna
Type: Metal Polish
Price: 19.99

A universal, fast-acting pre-polishing compound. Menzerna Heavy Cut 439T quickly removes throwing marks, orange peel and sanding marks from a variety of metal substrates including stainless steel, aluminum, brass, and other non-ferrous metals. 

Cut / Gloss: 8 / 5

Capable of removing 280 grit sanding marks, 439T is recommended by Menzerna as a first step in a two-stage polishing process. Bring your aluminum or stainless surface to a high gloss by following up with Menzerna 480BLF or P126 Finish compounds. Additional polishing steps can add more clarity.

entry.title: Menzerna Medium Cut 333
entry.summary:
Vendor: Menzerna
Type: Metal Polish
Price: 25.99

Produces cut and gloss in one step. Menzerna Medium Cut 333 is an abrasive chromium oxide compound designed for use on stainless steel and precious metals, but it’s also extremely well suited for chrome finishing. .

Cut / Gloss: 5 / 6

333 is recommended by Menzerna as the second step in a three-stage polishing process. Bring your stainless steel to a high gloss, mirror finish by following Menzerna 523LBZ with 333, and then with Menzerna P175 Super Finish. Additional polishing steps can add more clarity.

entry.title: Menzerna Super Heavy Cut 523LBZ
entry.summary:
Vendor: Menzerna
Type: Metal Polish
Price: 20.99

Super heavy cut for a brushed, de-burred, and satin-finished surface. Menzerna Super Heavy Cut 523LBZ is a high-performance brush compound with a high grease content; it works very quickly to produce a consistently fine, matte surface. Can also be used as the first polishing stage in bringing stainless steel to a mirror finish.

Cut / Gloss: 9 / 1

Capable of removing 180 grit sanding marks from stainless steel, 523LBZ is recommended by Menzerna as a first step in a three-stage polishing process. Bring your work surface to a high gloss, mirror finish by following up with Menzerna 333 Medium Cut and Menzerna P175 Super Finish. Additional polishing steps can add more clarity. 523LBZ is also suitable for producing a brushed finish on aluminum, brass, and other non-ferrous metals.

Menzerna suggested process for: stainless steel.

Precautions: Do not breathe dust during use. Wear appropriate safety clothing and respiratory protection. Generated dust exposure can irritate eyes and skin.

entry.title: Menzerna Universal Metal Polish 125 grams
entry.summary:
Vendor: Menzerna
Type: Abrasive Products
Price: 18.99

Universal Metal Polish cleans and polishes stainless steel, aluminium, chrome, brass, copper, silver and plastics. Perfect gloss for exhaust, radiator grille, decorative strips, rims etc. Also perfect on domestic and leisure parts like cutlery, sanitary fittings, metal instruments etc.

Menzerna Metal Polish is certified by NSF (National Sanitation Foundation) under the Category Code A7. NSF is the world leader in product certification for Food safety with a focus on Food, water, indoor air and the environment. NSF conducts product testing and material analyses through to unannounced plant inspection. Every aspect of a products development is thoroughly evaluated before it can earn certification.

Benefits:
  • Easy application
  • Economical consumption
  • Reliable results
  • Versatile in application: trade, domestic home, leisure
  • Silicone-free
Processing:

1. Apply Metal Polish by hand with microfibre

2. Metal Polish with circular movements

3. Remove residue with a clean, soft cloth

entry.title: Menzerna Solid Grit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Menzerna
Type: Paint Correction
Price: 9.99 - 11.99 (2 variants)

Sanding block for sanding clear coat surfaces. Solid Grit reliably and easily removes scratches, runs, dust inclusions, etching and orange peel, and is perfect for use on repairs. The two P2000 and P3000 sanding blocks are supplied in a handy plexiglass case. Both blocks are very low-wearing and ensure the best manual sanding quality.

  • Prevents deep sanding marks
  • Low-wearing
  • Long service life
  • Sanding without a machine
  • Even sanding pattern
  • Handy, easy to use
  • Best sanding quality
  • Versatile in application thanks to different sanding grades
